We congratulate the people of the UAE, its president and rulers, and all the residents of its good land, our 42nd National Day, a great day, a day of joy, and feelings of pride.
In this day, we remember the hands that raised the flag in 1971 ... and we salute the sincere hands that are working to lift it ... and we appeal to the hands of our children to build their future.

The parents had a dream and made it a reality. We have a dream. We have a dream for every child to be a leader. Every young man can be successful. Every family can live in comfort, comfort and tranquility.

Holding a speech at the 17th #tourism summit in #Berlin. #tourismusgipfel
Travelling has brought our continent together and has made #European unity something tangible, beneficial and attractive. #tourismusgipfel
#Tourism made it more natural to be #European. It has contributed to consolidating European identity, based on Europe's cultural #diversity
At the same time the importance of #Europe for the #tourism sector is equally vital. #tourismusgipfel
Where would #tourism be today without the four freedoms of the #European #singlemarket? #tourismusgipfel
#Tourism is a powerful engine for domestic demand-driven growth. #tourismusgipfel
Southern Europe has performed even better than average in recent years. #tourismusgipfel
#Spain, with 34 million tourists between January and July, had a 4% rise in international arrivals. #tourismusgipfel
#Greece +9.2%, #Malta +10% and #Portugal +8% all reported impressive #growth. #tourismusgipfel

Brothers and sisters .. We will hold ministerial retreat in the coming days with all ministers for two days .. We decided to devote two days to discuss the development of the health and education sectors
I want to involve all members of society in this retreat, education and health issues are all touching us, we want to unite around them and create new ideas in development

All young and old, women and men want them to provide us with ideas and suggestions for the development of health education, we want the largest national brainstorming session to discuss new solutions
Please submit your thoughts on http://t.co/eXtPEzA4Hv and video questions on brainstorming@uaepm.ae and your posts on Twitter #
We will discuss a lot of positive ideas over the course of two days and are optimistic about our participation and our ability to develop in these sectors
The development of education and health in the country is a shared national responsibility .. and we come back from our people on ideas and creative solutions and renewable

The parliament is the nation that constitutes the governments, and the people who serve them. The TGNA is the government appointed by the nation's deputies.
We are not unemployed. That is to say, the Millet is incapable of giving its own decision, drawing its own direction itself.
The media, the pressure groups, the capital groups, the gangs can not replace the Assembly, can not see themselves on the council, can not decide on behalf of the nation.
We will not allow any power until today to allow the Assembly, politics and national will to submit to it, and not allow it anymore.
